## ShellSession.expect() method

Waits for the given string to be printed on the terminal. Gives up once `timeoutMs` has elapsed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
expect(str: any, timeoutMs?: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | any |  |
|  timeoutMs | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
